name: The Invaders
description:
YOU are the alien. Use your psychic powers to control the humans.

Destroy as much as you can from the planet in the given time.

There is one extra minute scattered around the planet. Pick up the clocks to increase your destroy time.

GOOD LUCK, ALIEN!

CONTROLS

WASD to move around

LEFT CLICK to choose who you want to control

SPACE to go back to the mother ship.
